org.chrisjr.loom.transforms

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chrisjr.loom.transforms.Transform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Transforms.Noop, Transforms.Reverse, Transforms.Rewrite, Transforms.Shift, Transforms.Speed

    public abstract class Transform
extends Object
    A Transform must define call as a function that takes a Pattern as input and returns a new Pattern.
    Author:
    chrisjr

      • call

        public abstract Pattern call(Pattern original)
        Executes the transform on the original pattern, and returns the modified version.

        Returns:

        public static Callable<Void> toCallable(Transform transform,
                        Pattern original)
        Turns a Transform into a Callable<Void>.
        Parameters:
        transform - the Transform to use
        original - the pattern to which the transform should be applied

        a new Callable
